core
Class VSMessage

java.lang.Object
  prefs.VSPrefs
      core.VSMessage

public class VSMessage
extends VSPrefs

An object of this class represents a message which is sent from one process to another process in the simulator.

Author:
Paul C. Buetow

isServerMessage

public boolean isServerMessage()
Checks if the message has been sent by a server or a client.

Returns:
true, if the message has been sent by a server. false, if the message has been sent by a client.
